maasai.title: Maasai Mara - R290 All-in-one
maasai.description:
This installation showcases the Maasai Mara project.
High-efficiency R290 all-in-one systems designed for superior
performance, reliability, and energy savings in African environments.
Installed as the main hot water source in a 100% solar-powered,
fully off-grid residential property.

ngong.title: Ngong - R290 All-in-one
ngong.description:
This installation showcases the Ngong project.
High-performance R290 all-in-one heat pump system engineered for
excellent efficiency and low noise. Installed in a solar-powered
residential home where heat pumps supply all hot water needs.

Karen__Runda_and_Rosslyn.title: Residential homes
Karen__Runda_and_Rosslyn.description: Another successful Ecotherm heat pump installation — delivering reliable hot water, lower energy bills, and a greener home. Heat Smart, Live Green.

Hillcrest_Installation.title: Changing rooms for International School
Hillcrest_Installation.description: Comfort meets efficiency: Ecotherm heat pumps supplying endless hot water to international school swimming pool changing rooms – a smart upgrade from outdated instant showers.

Nanyuki.title: We are in Nanyuki
Nanyuki.description: Off-grid done right in Nanyuki 🌞 Ecotherm solar heat pump = reliable hot water, zero grid dependency, maximum savings.
